mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(title, content, writer) VALUES (#{title},#{content},#{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT no, title, content, writer, DATE(post_date) AS post_date FROM board ORDER BY no desc
SELECT no, title, content, writer, DATE(post_date) AS post_date FROM board WHERE no = #{no} ORDER BY no desc
SELECT no,title,content,writer, DATE(post_date) AS post_date FROM board WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{find},'%')
